sqls.sql: SELECT id, acceptance_id, acceptance_code, purchase_order_id, purchase_order_code, purchase_order_detail_id, receive_id, receive_code, receive_detail_id, goods_id, goods_code, goods_name, goods_generic_name, goods_specification, goods_place, preparation_id, unit_id, (select name from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary d where d.`category`="preparation_id" and d.`value` = preparation_id ) as preparation_name, (select name from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary d where d.`category`="unit_id" and d.`value` = unit_id ) as unit_name, manufacturer, registration_code, batch_code, production_time, expire_time, sterilization_batch, arrival_quantity, sampling_quantity, acceptance_quantity, rejected_quantity, storage_quantity, purchase_price, acceptance_amount, amount, inspection_report, goods_quality, rejection_reason, acceptance_conclusion, create_time, update_time FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_acceptance_detail where acceptance_id = ${key}

SELECT id, code, supplier_id, supplier_code, supplier_name, purchase_order_id, purchase_order_code, accepter_id, accepter_code, accepter_name, accept_time, creater_id, creater_name, originator_id, originator_name, originate_time, modifier_id, modifier_name, storage_user_id, storage_user_name, storage_time, approver_id, approver_name, approve_time, reviewer_id, reviewer_name, reviewer_time, pay_status, ( SELECT NAME FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary dd WHERE dd.`category` = "purchase_acceptance_status" AND dd.`value` = pay_status ) AS status_name, finance_approve_status, amount, create_time, update_time FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_acceptance where id=${key}

insert into SAAS_TEST.saas_acceptance(
id,
code,
supplier_id,
supplier_code,
supplier_name,
purchase_order_id,
purchase_order_code,
accepter_id,
accepter_code,
accepter_name,
creater_id,
creater_name,
originator_id,
originator_name,
modifier_id,
modifier_name,
storage_user_id,
storage_user_name,
approver_id,
approver_name,
reviewer_id,
reviewer_name,
pay_status,
finance_approve_status,
amount,
accept_time, originate_time, approve_time, reviewer_time, storage_time, create_time, update_time ) values(
${id},
${code},
${supplier_id},
${supplier_code},
${supplier_name},
${purchase_order_id},
${purchase_order_code},
${accepter_id},
${accepter_code},
${accepter_name},
${creater_id},
${creater_name},
${originator_id},
${originator_name},
${modifier_id},
${modifier_name},
${storage_user_id},
${storage_user_name},
${approver_id},
${approver_name},
${reviewer_id},
${reviewer_name},
${pay_status},
${finance_approve_status},
${amount},
now(), now(), now(), now(), now(), now(), now() )

insert into saas_serial_number(type, date, num ) select 'pur_accept_num', now(), IFNULL((select num FROM saas_serial_number WHERE type = 'pur_accept_num' and to_days(date) = to_days(now()) order by num desc LIMIT 0,1),0)+1 as num;
SELECT CONCAT('CGYS',DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d'),LPAD(num,4,'0')) AS code FROM saas_serial_number WHERE type = 'pur_accept_num' and to_days(date) = to_days(now()) order by num desc LIMIT 0,1;

insert into SAAS_TEST.saas_acceptance_detail(
acceptance_id,
acceptance_code,
purchase_order_id,
purchase_order_code,
purchase_order_detail_id,
receive_id,
receive_code,
receive_detail_id,
goods_id,
goods_code,
goods_name,
goods_generic_name,
goods_specification,
goods_place,
preparation_id,
unit_id,
manufacturer,
registration_code,
batch_code,
production_time,
expire_time,
sterilization_batch,
arrival_quantity,
sampling_quantity,
acceptance_quantity,
rejected_quantity,
storage_quantity,
purchase_price,
acceptance_amount,
amount,
inspection_report,
goods_quality,
rejection_reason,
acceptance_conclusion,
storage_id,
create_time, update_time, ) values(
${keyProperty},
${code},
${test8.purchase_order_id},
${test8.purchase_order_code},
${test8.purchase_order_detail_id},
${test8.receive_id},
${test8.receive_code},
${test8.receive_detail_id},
${test8.goods_id},
${test8.goods_code},
${test8.goods_name},
${test8.goods_generic_name},
${test8.goods_specification},
${test8.goods_place},
${test8.preparation_id},
${test8.unit_id},
${test8.manufacturer},
${test8.registration_code},
${test8.batch_code},
${test8.production_time},
${test8.expire_time},
${test8.sterilization_batch},
${test8.arrival_quantity},
${test8.sampling_quantity},
${test8.acceptance_quantity},
${test8.rejected_quantity},
${test8.storage_quantity},
${test8.purchase_price},
${test8.acceptance_quantity}*${test8.purchase_price},
${test8.amount},
${test8.inspection_report},
${test8.goods_quality},
${test8.rejection_reason},
${test8.acceptance_conclusion},
${test8.storage_id},
now(), now(), )

insert into SAAS_TEST.saas_acceptance_detail(
acceptance_id,
acceptance_code,
purchase_order_id,
purchase_order_code,
purchase_order_detail_id,
receive_id,
receive_code,
receive_detail_id,
goods_id,
goods_code,
goods_name,
goods_generic_name,
goods_specification,
goods_place,
preparation_id,
unit_id,
manufacturer,
registration_code,
batch_code,
production_time,
expire_time,
sterilization_batch,
arrival_quantity,
sampling_quantity,
acceptance_quantity,
rejected_quantity,
storage_quantity,
purchase_price,
acceptance_amount,
inspection_report,
goods_quality,
rejection_reason,
acceptance_conclusion,
create_time, update_time, ) values(
${key},
${code},
${test8.purchase_order_id},
${test8.purchase_order_code},
${test8.purchase_order_detail_id},
${test8.receive_id},
${test8.receive_code},
${test8.receive_detail_id},
${test8.goods_id},
${test8.goods_code},
${test8.goods_name},
${test8.goods_generic_name},
${test8.goods_specification},
${test8.goods_place},
${test8.preparation_id},
${test8.unit_id},
${test8.manufacturer},
${test8.registration_code},
${test8.batch_code},
${test8.production_time},
${test8.expire_time},
${test8.sterilization_batch},
${test8.arrival_quantity},
${test8.sampling_quantity},
${test8.acceptance_quantity},
${test8.rejected_quantity},
${test8.storage_quantity},
${test8.purchase_price},
${test8.acceptance_amount},
${test8.inspection_report},
${test8.goods_quality},
${test8.rejection_reason},
${test8.acceptance_conclusion},
now(), now(), )
UPDATE SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_receive o SET o.`status` = '0' WHERE id = ${test8.receive_id}

UPDATE SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_receive o SET o.`status` = '1', o.finish_time = now() WHERE id = ${test8.receive_id} AND (SELECT count(*) FROM SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_receive_detail d WHERE d.purchase_receive_id = ${test8.receive_id} and d.status = '0') = 0

update SAAS_TEST.saas_acceptance set
id=${id},
code=${code},
supplier_id=${supplier_id},
supplier_code=${supplier_code},
supplier_name=${supplier_name},
purchase_order_id=${purchase_order_id},
purchase_order_code=${purchase_order_code},
accepter_id=${accepter_id},
accepter_code=${accepter_code},
accepter_name=${accepter_name},
accept_time=${accept_time},
creater_id=${creater_id},
creater_name=${creater_name},
originator_id=${originator_id},
originator_name=${originator_name},
originate_time=${originate_time},
modifier_id=${modifier_id},
modifier_name=${modifier_name},
storage_user_id=${storage_user_id},
storage_user_name=${storage_user_name},
storage_time=${storage_time},
approver_id=${approver_id},
approver_name=${approver_name},
approve_time=${approve_time},
pay_status=${pay_status},
finance_approve_status=${finance_approve_status},
amount=${amount},
create_time=${create_time},
update_time=${update_time},
where id=${key}
update SAAS_TEST.saas_acceptance set amount= (select IFNULL(sum(amount), 0) from SAAS_TEST.saas_acceptance_detail where acceptance_id = ${keyProperty}) where id=${keyProperty}
update SAAS_TEST.saas_acceptance set acceptance_amount= (select IFNULL(sum(acceptance_amount), 0) from SAAS_TEST.saas_acceptance_detail where acceptance_id = ${keyProperty}) where id=${keyProperty}
update SAAS_TEST.saas_acceptance set amount= (select IFNULL(sum(amount), 0) from SAAS_TEST.saas_acceptance_detail where acceptance_id = ${key}) where id=${key}
update SAAS_TEST.saas_acceptance set acceptance_amount= (select IFNULL(sum(acceptance_amount), 0) from SAAS_TEST.saas_acceptance_detail where acceptance_id = ${key}) where id=${key}

select count(a.s_id) channelsid from saas_purchase_order a where 1=1
and create_time >= ${startTime}
and create_time <= ${endTime}
and s_id like %${s_id}%
and pinyin_code like %${pinyin_code}%
and code like %${code}%
and order_states like %${order_states}%

delete from SAAS_TEST.saas_purchase_order where
id= ${id}

delete from SAAS_TEST.saas_acceptance_detail where
acceptance_id= ${key}

insert into SAAS_TEST.saas_inventory(
goods_id,
goods_code,
batch_code,
supplier_id,
supplier_code,
quantity,
order_price,
remark,
creater_id,
creater_name,
modifier_id,
modifier_name,
status,
storage_id,
qualified, inventory_type, create_time, update_time ) values(
${test8.goods_id},
${test8.goods_code},
${test8.batch_code},
${test8.supplier_id},
${test8.supplier_code},
${test8.acceptance_quantity},
${test8.inventory_type},
${test8.purchase_price},
${test8.remark},
${test8.creater_id},
${test8.creater_name},
${test8.modifier_id},
${test8.modifier_name},
${test8.status},
${test8.storage_id},
0, 0, now(), now() )

insert into saas_goods_batch( goods_id, code, production_time, expire_time )select ${test8.goods_id}, ${test8.batch_code}, ${test8.production_time}, ${test8.expire_time} from dual where NOT EXISTS (select * from saas_goods_batch d where d.goods_id = ${test8.goods_id} and d.code = ${test8.batch_code})

insert into SAAS_TEST.saas_inventory(
goods_id,
goods_code,
batch_code,
supplier_id,
supplier_code,
quantity,
order_price,
remark,
creater_id,
creater_name,
modifier_id,
modifier_name,
status,
storage_id, qualified, inventory_type, create_time, update_time ) values(
${test8.goods_id},
${test8.goods_code},
${test8.batch_code},
${test8.supplier_id},
${test8.supplier_code},
${test8.rejected_quantity},
${test8.inventory_type},
${test8.purchase_price},
${test8.remark},
${test8.creater_id},
${test8.creater_name},
${test8.modifier_id},
${test8.modifier_name},
${test8.status},
-1, 1, 0, now(), now() )

insert into SAAS_TEST.saas_inventory_detail(
inventory_id,
goods_id,
goods_code,
goods_name,
supplier_id,
supplier_code,
goods_generic_name,
goods_specification,
manufacturer,
goods_place,
preparation_id,
unit_id,
registration_code,
batch_code,
purchased_price,
quantity,
status,
creater_id,
creater_name,
storage_id,
inventory_type, create_time, update_time ) values(
${keyProperty},
${test8.goods_id},
${test8.goods_code},
${test8.goods_name},
${test8.supplier_id},
${test8.supplier_code},
${test8.goods_generic_name},
${test8.goods_specification},
${test8.manufacturer},
${test8.goods_place},
${test8.preparation_id},
${test8.unit_id},
${test8.registration_code},
${test8.batch_code},
${test8.purchase_price},
${test8.acceptance_quantity},
${test8.status},
${test8.creater_id},
${test8.creater_name},
${test8.storage_id},
0, now(), now() )

insert into SAAS_TEST.saas_inventory_detail(
inventory_id,
goods_id,
goods_code,
goods_name,
supplier_id,
supplier_code,
goods_generic_name,
goods_specification,
manufacturer,
goods_place,
preparation_id,
unit_id,
registration_code,
batch_code,
purchased_price,
quantity,
status,
creater_id,
creater_name,
storage_id, qualified, inventory_type, create_time, update_time ) values(
${keyProperty},
${test8.goods_id},
${test8.goods_code},
${test8.goods_name},
${test8.supplier_id},
${test8.supplier_code},
${test8.goods_generic_name},
${test8.goods_specification},
${test8.manufacturer},
${test8.goods_place},
${test8.preparation_id},
${test8.unit_id},
${test8.registration_code},
${test8.batch_code},
${test8.purchase_price},
${test8.rejected_quantity},
${test8.status},
${test8.creater_id},
${test8.creater_name},
-1, 1, 0, now(), now() )
select CASE WHEN CONVERT(${test8.arrival_quantity},SIGNED) >= CONVERT(${test8.acceptance_quantity},SIGNED) THEN 'false' ELSE 'true' END AS mustBreak
SELECT CASE WHEN ${test8.production_time} >= ${test8.expire_time} THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS mustBreak
SELECT CASE WHEN ${test8} = '[]' THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS mustBreak

condition.title: 验收单状态
condition.name: pay_status
condition.sql: select a.value id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_dictionary a where a.category = 'purchase_acceptance_status'

step.breakMessage: 合格数量大于到货数量，请重新输入！
合格数量大于到货数量，请重新输入！
有效期需大于生产日期，请重新输入！
没有需要保存的信息，请先添加！

clumn.name: storage_id
clumn.title: 货位
clumn.sql: select a.id id,a.name text from SAAS_TEST.saas_storage a where a.id != '-1'
